hymn.title: When this passing world is done (Alternate Tune)

layout.singingstanza: When this pass -- ing world is done, When has sunk yon glar -- ing sun, When we stand with Christ on high, Look -- ing o'er life's his -- to -- ry; Then, Lord, shall I ful -- ly know, Not till then, how much I owe.

lyrics.stanza: When this passing world is done, When has sunk yon glaring sun, When we stand with Christ on high, Looking o'er life's history; Then, Lord, shall I fully know, Not till then, how much I owe.
When I stand before the throne Dressed in beauty not my own, When I see Thee as Thou art, Love Thee with unsinning heart; Then, Lord, shall I fully know, Not till then, how much I owe.
